name: Diversionary Tactics (V)
Lore: 'Rebel pilots understand that what they lack in numbers, they must make up for in strategy. They often use diversions to remove dangerous opponents from a conflict.',
Text: 'USED: Target one piloted starship at a system. That starship is hyperspeed -1 for remainder of turn.LOST: If you have 2 unique (•) piloted Rebel (or [Republic]) starfighters in battle at a system, draw destiny. If destiny < 4, exclude one starship from that battle.(Original concept by Thomas Caspersen - Norwegian Nationals 2006)',
